message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product! I'm excited to start our negotiation. After careful consideration, I'm willing to offer you the product for $1,400,000. This is a great deal, considering the product's value to you is $1,200,000. I'm confident you'll find this price very competitive.
Hello Alice, thanks for the offer, but that price is a little too high for me. I'm willing to pay $1,000,000 for the product.  I believe this is a fair offer considering its value to me.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your concerns about the price, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to lower the price to $1,200,000. This is the lowest I can go, considering the product's value to me. I believe this is still a fair price considering the value it holds for you.
